Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
-- Allows the wielder to become a boss -- Destroy all those flyers with this -- Who is the Kami now?
-- 20 second cooldown -- Add a RBXGear lib that allows for unified GUIs
local Range = 150 local RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")) local function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do print(instance) wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end
local function Wait(para) -- bypasses the latency para = para or wait() local Initial = tick() repeat RunService.Stepped:Wait() until tick()-Initial >= para end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator"; Creator_Tag.Value = player; game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for _, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
--[[local function WeldTogether(Part0, Part1, JointType, WeldParent) --- Weld's 2 parts together -- @param Part0 The first part -- @param Part1 The second part (Dependent part most of the time). -- @param [JointType] The type of joint. Defaults to weld. -- @param [WeldParent] Parent of the weld, Defaults to Part0 (so GC is better). -- @return The weld created.
JointType = JointType or "Weld"
local NewWeld = Instance.new(JointType) NewWeld.Part0 = Part0; NewWeld.Part1 = Part1; NewWeld.C0 = CFrame.new(); NewWeld.C1 = Part1.CFrame:toObjectSpace(Part0.CFrame); NewWeld.Parent = WeldParent or Part0;
return NewWeld end]]
local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle local AbilityInput = (Tool:FindFirstChild("WingSlash") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction"));AbilityInput.Name = "WingSlash";AbilityInput.Parent = Tool
local Sounds = { Slash = Sword:WaitForChild("SlashSound") }
local Directory -- Used for Guiding for R6 and R15 animations local Animations
Tool.Enabled = true
-- The coolness factor local Fire_Part = Sword:WaitForChild("FirePart") local Wing_Fire = Fire_Part:WaitForChild("WingFire") --[[function CreateFire() Fire_Part = (Sword:FindFirstChild("FirePart") or Instance.new("Part"));Fire_Part.Name = "FirePart" Fire_Part.Size = Vector3.new(0.2,0.2,0.2) Fire_Part.Transparency = 1 Fire_Part.CanCollide = false
Wing_Fire =(Fire_Part:FindFirstChild("WingFire") or Instance.new("Fire"));Wing_Fire.Name = "WingFire" Wing_Fire.Color = Color3.fromRGB(51, 102, 153) Wing_Fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.fromRGB(165, 0, 33) Wing_Fire.Heat = 25 Wing_Fire.Size = 4 Wing_Fire.Parent = Fire_Part
Fire_Part.CFrame = Sword.CFrame*CFrame.new(0,-1,0) Fire_Part.Parent = Sword if not Tool:FindFirstChild("JointInstance") then WeldTogether(Sword,Fire_Part,"Weld",Fire_Part) end end]]
-- Flat damage, it also has burst using the WingCutter local Damage = 19
local Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")) local Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players"))
local Effect_Part = Instance.new('Part') Effect_Part.FormFactor =3 Effect_Part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2) Effect_Part.Name = 'WingCutter'
-- TODO: Add the mesh and texture IDs local Effect_Mesh = Instance.new('SpecialMesh') Effect_Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) Effect_Mesh.Parent = Effect_Part
local Effect_Fire = Wing_Fire:Clone() --Effect_Fire.Heat = 25 --Effect_Fire.Size = 5 Effect_Fire.LockedToPart = false Effect_Fire.Parent = Effect_Part
local IsHeld = false local Character local Humanoid local Torso function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and Humanoid and not IsTeamMate(Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character),Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(humanoid.Parent)) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid,Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if Wing_Fire and Wing_Fire.Enabled == true then spawn(function() local Root = (humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or humanoid.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso")) if humanoid and humanoid.Parent and Root and not Root:FindFirstChild("WingFire") and not IsTeamMate(Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character),Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(humanoid.Parent)) then local cFire = Wing_Fire:Clone() cFire.Parent = Root Debris:AddItem(cFire, 4) local duration = 4 while duration > 0 do UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid,Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character)) humanoid:TakeDamage(5) duration = duration - 1 wait(1.0) end end end) end end end end
function onEquipped() --CreateFire() Character = Tool.Parent Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Torso = (Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart"))
Directory = Tool:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name) Animations = { Charge = Directory:WaitForChild("ChargeAnim"), Slash = Directory:WaitForChild("SlashAnim"), Stab = Directory:WaitForChild("StabAnim"), Wing = Directory:WaitForChild("WingAnim") } --Wing_Fire.Enabled = true end
function onUnequipped() IsHeld = false --CreateFire() end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(onUnequipped) Tool.Activated:Connect(function() if not Tool.Enabled then return end Tool.Enabled = false IsHeld = true local currentSpeed = Humanoid.WalkSpeed local ChargeAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations.Charge) if ChargeAnim then ChargeAnim:Play() end while IsHeld do Humanoid.WalkSpeed = math.min(Humanoid.WalkSpeed + 0.1, 22) Wait(0.1) end local Anim if ChargeAnim then ChargeAnim:Stop(); local index = math.random(1,2) Anim = ((index>1 and Animations.Stab) or Animations.Slash) local SlashingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Anim) if SlashingAnim then SlashingAnim:Play() end end if Sounds.Slash then Sounds.Slash:Play() end if Anim == Animations.Stab then Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.5, 0, 1, -0, 0, 0, 0, -1, 0, 1, 0) end Wait(1.3) Tool.Grip = CFrame.new(0, -2.5, 0, 0, 0, -1, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = (currentSpeed > 0 and currentSpeed) or 16 Tool.Enabled = true end) Tool.Deactivated:Connect(function() IsHeld = false end) Sword.Touched:Connect(blow)
local function IsInTable(Table,Value) for i,v in pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
function IsCharacterFlying(char) -- helps check if person is flying local FlightClasses = {"BodyPosition","BodyThrust","BodyVelocity"} if char then for i,v in pairs(FlightClasses) do if char:FindFirstChildWhichIsA(v,true) then return true end end end return false end
local Special = true function AbilityInput.OnServerInvoke(Player,Key) if not Key == Enum.KeyCode.Q then return end if not Special then return end Special = false local WingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations.Wing) if Humanoid and WingAnim then WingAnim:Play() end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Wait(1.25) Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 for i,v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do if v and v~= Player and v.Character then local Root = (v.Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart")) local EnemyHumanoid = v.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if Root and (Root.CFrame.p-Torso.CFrame.p).magnitude<=Range then local GearFound = v.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Tool") if GearFound and IsCharacterFlying(v.Character) and not IsTeamMate(Player,v) then Root.Anchored = true if EnemyHumanoid then EnemyHumanoid:UnequipTools() end
GearFound:Destroy()
local ePart = Effect_Part:Clone() ePart.CFrame = Torso.CFrame ePart.CanCollide = false
local bForce = Instance.new('BodyForce') bForce.Name = 'Float' bForce.force = Vector3.new(0, ePart:GetMass() * 196.2, 0) bForce.Parent = ePart
-- I know, this is super fast, but that's how I roll ePart.Velocity = (Root.CFrame.p - Torso.CFrame.p).unit * 200.0 ePart.Parent = workspace
Debris:AddItem(ePart, 5) local TouchedHumanoids = {} ePart.Touched:Connect(function(hit) local Hum = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if hit and hit.Parent and Root and Hum ~= Humanoid then if Hum and not IsInTable(TouchedHumanoids,Hum) then TouchedHumanoids[#TouchedHumanoids+1]=Hum print("Damaging " ..Hum.Parent.Name) UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Player) Hum:TakeDamage(65) end end end)
if not v.Character:FindFirstChild('UnwingScript') then local tScript = script.UnwingScript:Clone() tScript.Parent = v.Character tScript.Disabled = false end end --Root.Anchored = true
end end end Wait(20) Special = true
end

-- Unwing this flyer!
local function WaitForChild(parent, child) while not parent:FindFirstChild(child) do parent.ChildAdded:Wait() end return parent[child] end
local Character = script.Parent local Torso = WaitForChild(Character, 'HumanoidRootPart') local Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService('Debris')
local Wing_List = {['RightWing'] = true, ['LeftWing'] = true} local cChildren = Character:GetChildren() for k = 1, #cChildren do if cChildren[k]:IsA('BasePart') and Wing_List[cChildren[k].Name] then local wing = cChildren[k] wing:BreakJoints() RBX_Debris:AddItem(wing, 7.5) end
if cChildren[k]:IsA('Tool') then Humanoid:UnequipTools() cChildren[k]:Destroy() end end
Torso.Anchored = true
local Thorn_Part = Instance.new('Part') Thorn_Part.CanCollide = false Thorn_Part.Size = Vector3.new(2, 4, 2) Thorn_Part.CFrame = Torso.CFrame Thorn_Part.Anchored = true Thorn_Part.Parent = Character
Thorn_Mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") Thorn_Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54653968" Thorn_Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=54654008" Thorn_Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.0, 1.0, 0.6) Thorn_Mesh.Parent = Thorn_Part Thorn_Mesh.VertexColor = Vector3.new(0.1, 0.1, 0.9)
local tChildren = Torso:GetChildren() for i = 1, #tChildren do if tChildren[i] and string.sub(tChildren[i].Name, 1, 6) == 'Flight' then tChildren[i]:Destroy() end end
wait(3.75) for i,v in pairs(Character:GetDescendants()) do if v:IsA("BasePart") and v.Name == "Torso" or v.Name == "HumanoidRootPart" then v.Anchored = false elseif v:IsA("BodyVelocity") or v:IsA("BodyThrust") or v:IsA("BodyPosition") then v:Destroy() end end Thorn_Part:Destroy()
wait(1)
script:Destroy()

local function waitForChild(parent, instance) while parent:FindFirstChild(instance) == nil do wait() end return parent:FindFirstChild(instance) end local vPlayer = game.Players.LocalPlayer local Tool = script.Parent local Sword = Tool.Handle local Input = (game:FindService("UserInputService") or game:GetService("UserInputService")) local Remote = (Tool:WaitForChild("WingSlash"))
local RBX_Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Animating_Bool = false
local PlayerGui local Wing_Gui local Wing_Frame local Bar_Frame
local MouseDown local MouseUp local KeyInput
local function createBarGui() if PlayerGui then Wing_Gui = Instance.new("ScreenGui") Wing_Gui.Name = "WingGui" Wing_Gui.Parent = PlayerGui
Wing_Frame = Instance.new("Frame") Wing_Frame.BackgroundTransparency = 1.0 Wing_Frame.Name = "WingFrame" Wing_Frame.Style = Enum.FrameStyle.RobloxSquare Wing_Frame.Parent = Wing_Gui Wing_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 220, 0, 30) Wing_Frame.Position = UDim2.new(0.5, -110, 1, -130)
Bar_Frame = Instance.new("Frame") Bar_Frame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.0 Bar_Frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.9) Bar_Frame.Parent = Wing_Frame Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 30) Bar_Frame.Position = UDim2.new(0, -8, 0, -8) Bar_Frame.Name = "Bar" end end
local function onEquipped(mouse) PlayerGui = waitForChild(vPlayer, "PlayerGui") if not Wing_Gui or not Wing_Gui.Parent then createBarGui() end local debounce = false MouseDown = mouse.Button1Down:Connect(function() MouseDown_Bool = true if debounce or not Tool.Enabled then return end debounce = true while MouseDown_Bool and debounce do debounce = true Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0,math.min((Bar_Frame.Size.X.Offset +3),220), 0, 30) wait(0.1) end end)
MouseUp = mouse.Button1Up:Connect(function() if not MouseDown_Bool then return end MouseDown_Bool = false --wait(1.5) repeat wait() until Tool.Changed:Wait()=="Enabled" Bar_Frame.Size = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 30) debounce = false end)
KeyInput = Input.InputBegan:Connect(function(InputObject,Processed) if InputObject.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then if InputObject.KeyCode == Enum.KeyCode.Q then if Remote then Remote:InvokeServer(InputObject.KeyCode) end end end end)
end
local function onUnequipped() -- Do stuff if Wing_Gui and Wing_Gui.Parent then --Fix implemented by Luckymaxer Wing_Gui:Destroy() end MouseDown_Bool = false if MouseDown then MouseDown:Disconnect() end if MouseUp then MouseUp:Disconnect() end if KeyInput then KeyInput:Disconnect() end end
local function onChanged()
end
Tool.Changed:Connect(onChanged)
Tool.Equipped:Connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(onUnequipped)

Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
Tool:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(UpdateIcon) Tool.Equipped:Connect(OnEquipped)
